testcase.name: TC1201_Employee should see all the information related to the customers.
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to the home page and log in.................................passed Then User clicks on My Operations field.....................................passed Then User clicks on Manage Customers field..................................passed Given User checks the First Name............................................passed And User checks the Last Name...............................................passed And User checks the Middle Initial..........................................passed And User checks the Email...................................................passed And User checks the Mobile Phone Number.....................................passed And User checks the Phone Number............................................passed And User checks the Address.................................................passed And User checks the Create Date.............................................passed And User quits..............................................................passed

testcase.name: TC1202_Employee should see all the information through "View" button and can edit from View Page
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to the home page and log in.................................passed Then User clicks on My Operations field.....................................passed Then User clicks on Manage Customers field..................................passed Given User clicks on View button on a customer..............................passed And User clicks on Back button..............................................passed And User clicks on View button on a customer................................passed And User clicks on Edit button..............................................passed And User quits..............................................................passed

testcase.name: TC1203_Employee should be able to edit customer info from Edit Page
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to the home page and log in.................................passed Then User clicks on My Operations field.....................................passed Then User clicks on Manage Customers field..................................passed Given User clicks on Edit button on a customer..............................passed And User changes the FirstName..............................................passed And User changes the LastName...............................................passed And User changes the Email..................................................passed And User changes the MobilePhoneNumber......................................passed And User changes the ZipCode................................................passed And User changes the Address................................................passed And User clicks on Save Button..............................................passed Then verifies the success message...........................................passed And User quits..............................................................passed

testcase.name: TC1204_Employee should be able to delete customer
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to the home page and log in.................................passed Then User clicks on My Operations field.....................................passed Then User clicks on Manage Customers field..................................passed Given User clicks on Delete button on a customer............................passed And User clicks on Cancel button............................................passed And User clicks on Delete button on a customer..............................passed And User confirms the deletion..............................................passed And User quits..............................................................passed
